text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
Even just the announcement of Symboli<n>Rudolf's
debut race has caused quite a<n>stir in the racing
world, but she herself<n>seems unfazed by the
attention.

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
She has told me her objectives: first to<n>claim the
Classic Triple Crown, then to<n>cement her status as
the true Emperor<n>with further accolades.

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
Together, we set out to realize her<n>vision: a world
in which all Umamusume<n>can live in bliss!
